name: Book Of Shadows Complete Works Bound
description:
A charming grimoire of magickal practices and rituals that reads as if it were written in an earlier century. In a style that is poetic and appealing to the imagination, this book will give you practical directions illustrated in Gothic and Medieval Illuminated Manuscript style all of which take their inspiration from nature and folklore. Practice the wisdom of centuries past with the many spells potions and charms in this book. A beautiful volume both open and closed, each page featuring artwork inspired of times past. This is a softcover bound book with 150 pages sized 8 1/2 inches by 11 inches.
About the Author
About Kelly Fillion: An avid collector of rare folklore volumes and childrens books, Kelly spent her early years within the pages of books about haunted Victorian Houses, Ghost stories and books of fairies myth and magick. Following her love and natural talent in art and drawing she attended Sheridan College. Current obsessions include old books, antique shops, little dolls, folklore, superstitions, fortunetelling, wildflowers, wallpaper, cloudy landscapes, the colors of faded polaroids, and old sepia family snapshots. Please visit my main site www.dovegreystudio@blogspot.com

name: Lady Of The Woods Complete Book Of Shadows Hand Gilded Gold
description:
I am happy to share with you my handpainted complete Book Of Shadows. I have complied this book over 7 years and have filled it with all of my own artwork and handwritten texts.
I hand gild and dedicate every book with your chosen name of preference please email with choice when purchasing. I use 24 carat real gold leaf to complete each book for a truely beautiful timeless look.
Your book will contain 65 pages of information from a-z wicca references Altar Dedications, Fairy Wicca, Herbal Wicca, Divination, Tarot, Pendulum, Mirror Scrying,Goddesses and Rituals Cat Magick,Candle Magick,Crystal Magick,Celtic Lore,Butterfly and Moon Garden, Nocturnal Gardening, Green Magick,Sabbats,Festivals,and much more all beautifully illustrated and printed on heavy stock paper sized 8 1/2 inches by 11 inches, the pages are un-bound and ready for you to add to your exisiting or new Book Of Shadows.

♥♥♥♥♥♥ custom orders are more than welcome ♥♥♥♥♥♥
The Witches Garden

options.name: Complete Book Of Shadows Page Set Lady Of The Woods

name: Book Of Shadows Witch Personalized Cover Page Gold Gilded
description:
A beautifully illustrated hand gilded with 24 carat gold leaf cover page with your name inscribed on it. Each Book of Shadows should have a dedication page and something that makes your book truely magickal to look at and read. I have mine open on a book stand and change the pages from day to day.
All artwork is copyright of Kelly Fillion The Witch's Garden.
I include one of my handmade bookmarks which is signed and sealed with a magickal infused wax of Vervain, Jasmine, "Heliotrope" one of my favorites to work with Oils.
Blessed Be

visit my blog for more pictures of my book and pages
www.dovegreystudio.blogspot.com

name: Charmed Book Of Shadows Page Set
description:
This is a complete set of spell pages from the Charmed tv series Book Of Shadows, the high quality images are printed on 40lb french paper in antique gold parchment, this set includes
Cover Page (1 page)
Book Of Shadows Page (1 Page)
Spell To Vanquish Javna (2 Pages)
Spell Of Protection (2 Pages)
To Banish Shadow (2 Pages)
To Invoke The Power Of Three (2 Pages)
To Turn Back Time (2 Pages)
Truth Spell (2 Pages)

Pages are 8 1/2 inches by 11 un punched
and wrapped in a beautiful parchment paper tied with herbs and a blessed ribboned wax sealed book mark handmade by Kelly Fillion Artist of the Book Of Shadows.
